main.how_to_get_account_link: How do I get an account?
main.how_to_get_account_p1: Thank you so much for your interest in pvCloud platform.
main.how_to_get_account_p2: pvCloud is now in "BETA" mode; this is, at this moment we are validating the product brefore officially launching it to mainstream.
main.how_to_get_account_p3: At this moment pvCloud accounts are being opened through invitation from actual users / beta-testers.
main.how_to_get_account_p4: If any of your friends has an account ask them to invite you! :-)
